text: qul -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almshrkyn: 'aghayr allah 'ilhy w'ilhkm 'atlub hakamana bayni wbynkm, wahu subhanah aladhi 'anzal 'iilaykum alquran mbynana fih alhukm fima takhtasimun fih min 'amri wamrkm? wbnw 'iisrayiyl aladhin atahum allah altawrat wal'iinjil yaelamun elmana yqynana 'ana hdha alquran manzil ealayk -ayha alrswl- min rabik balhq, fala takunana min alshakkin fi shay' mimaa 'awhayna 'ilyk
